Name: Dr. C.N. Ashwath Narayan
Tweet: #KarnatakaTrustsModi to realise the dream of building a Swacch, Sundar and Surakshit #Karnataka.  The state will soon be free from the clutches of the inept @siddaramaiah govt and march on the road to prosperity under the leadership of Shri @BSYBJP.  #KarnatakaElections2018
